item.title: Finance
item.description: Orders In this section you can view all your orders and create new ones. Once you click on the “Send” button, an e-mail is sent to the address provided in the [Email Bot](/settings/index/#company) section. To create a order: Click on the top left “+ order” button and an empty order will be added to the list; Compile the order’s empty fields; Click on the “create” button. Fields description:
